price: بڵێ: تکا ھەمووی ھەر بۆ خوایە موڵکی ئاسمانەکان و زەوی ھەر بۆ ئەوە پاشان ھەر بۆلای ئەو دەگەڕێنرێنەوە
arabic: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ جَمِيعٗاۖ لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lillahi al-shafāʿatu jamīʿan lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
